name: A walk to The Cage, Lyme

ai.summary: A gentle 5.1 km round-trip walk from Lyme Regis to The Cage, offering coastal views along the Jurassic Coast. Easy terrain with occasional steps and gentle undulations, suitable for families and beginners.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly promenade and coastal path with flat sections, short flights of steps near The Cage, and some uneven gravel and grassy parts. Expect wind exposure and slippery surfaces when wet.
ai.safety_notes: Check tide and weather conditions before starting. Stay away from cliff edges and ensure children stay clear of the sea wall. Be cautious on wet or uneven ground; dress for wind and potential spray. Carry water, a fully charged phone, and a basic first-aid kit; inform someone of your route.
recommended_gear: Map or smartphone with offline map
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with the most pleasant conditions from March to October; plan for cooler, windy days out of peak summer.
